title: Antique Ruby and Diamond Pendant - "Ratna Deepam"
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish finish for a timeless luster.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases a central oval Burmese Ruby cabochon, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds in a closed setting. Three delicate diamond-studded motifs dangle below, each culminating in a cluster of rubies and freshwater pearls, adding a touch of playful elegance. The Hyderabadi polish lends a rich, antique sheen to the piece, enhancing its vintage appeal.
colors: and brilliant white (diamonds and pearls). The color palette is designed to evoke feelings of prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for formal evening wear.
description: This pendant is a testament to the rich jewelry-making heritage of Hyderabad. The Burmese ruby is a symbol of passion and energy, while the Polki diamonds represent timeless elegance. The combination of antique design and modern craftsmanship makes this piece a unique and cherished heirloom.
